ItemBlueprint.Name: Item_Artifact_010
ItemBlueprint.Description: Use: Nearby allied Demigods gain +[GetDamageBonus] Weapon Damage for [GetDuration] seconds. In addition, nearby units gain +[GetMinionDamageBonus] Weapon Damage for [GetDuration] seconds.

ItemBlueprint.Description: Use: Cast a ring of fire around yourself, damaging enemies for [GetDamage] damage over [GetDuration] seconds.

ItemBlueprint.Name: Item_Artifact_060
